---

title: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Get Payment Initiation"
description: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to receive Payment Initiations. This endpoint will be used by the Receiver (PISP) to poll for the status of the Payment Initiation. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/239337826/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+SV+Pagamentos+-+v4.0.0-beta.4), except by the Authentication type, it must implement a mTLS or a SecretKey (the same mechanics used by our Webhooks)."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Get Payment Initiation"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/client-implementation/pix/payments/v4/{paymentId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to receive Payment Initiations. This endpoint will be used by the Receiver (PISP) to poll for the status of the Payment Initiation. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/239337826/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+SV+Pagamentos+-+v4.0.0-beta.4), except by the Authentication type, it must implement a mTLS or a SecretKey (the same mechanics used by our Webhooks). 
The path can be parametrized by the client, it is just a suggestion, except by the fact that it must receive the PaymentId as a route or query parameter.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"paymentId","description":"Provider (ASPSP) unique identifier for the Payment","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

Payment Initiator specifically to carry out payment initiations where the payee is known in advance.","enum":["MANU","DICT","QRDN","QRES","INIC"],"type":"string","title":"ObkLocalInstrument"},"cnpjInitiator":{"description":"PISP (Receiver)
